column2: "Afei aber a Ɔhen Ahazia ne na Atalia hun dɛ ne ba no ewu no
column3: nna ɔsoɛree na ɔsɛɛ adehye asefo no nyinara."

column2: "Naaso ɔhen Joram ne babaa Jehoseba
column5: na owiaa no fii ɔhen ne mba no a wokum hɔn no mu
column7: na ɔdze hɔn kɛhyɛɛ mpiakyir; na wɔdze no sumaa Atalia

column2: "Na ɔnye no sumaa EWURADZE ne fie mfe esia a Atalia yɛɛ ɔhembaa wɔ asaase no do."
"Na afe a otsia esuon no mu no ɔsɔfo Jehoiada somae ma wɔkɛfaa ahemfie aweɔmfo na ahemfo do aweɔmfo mu ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no
column3: na wɔdze hɔn baa ne nkyɛn wɔ EWURADZE fie; na ɔnye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu
column4: na ɔmaa wɔkekaa ntam kyerɛɛ no wɔ EWURADZE fie
column5: na ɔdze ɔhen ne ba no kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn
column4: Adze a hom nyɛ nye yi: hom mu nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor a ɔba mu ahomgyeda no
column5: na wɔnyɛ ɔhen ne fi do hwɛ no n'ahwɛfo;"

column2: "na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor ntsena Sur kuropon ano; na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor ntsena brampafo ekyir kuropon no ano: dɛm na hom nhwɛ ofi no do hwɛ no
"Na hom mu ekuw ebien no
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn a wofir edzi ahomgyeda no nyinara no
column4: wɔnhwɛ EWURADZE ne fi do hwɛ no wɔ ɔhen no ho."

column2: "Na hom mbɔ ɔhen no ho aprɔw
column3: nyimpa biara mfa n'akodze nkitsa ne nsamu; na nyia ɔbɛba akyerɛpɛn no mu no
column4: wɔmma wonku no: na hom ndzi ɔhen no nkyɛn aber a orupue

column2: "Na ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔfo Jehoiada hyɛe no nyinara: na wɔfefaa nyimpa biara ne nyimpa
column3: hɔn a wɔwɔ dɛ wɔba mu ahomgyeda no
column4: kaa hɔn a wɔwɔ dɛ wofir edzi ahomgyeda no ho

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no yiyii mpeaa na akyɛm a ɔyɛ ɔhen David dze no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no
column3: memaa ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no."

column2: "Na aweɔmfo no gyinagyinae
column3: nyimpa biara n'akodze kitsa ne nsamu
column4: ofi ɔdan no n'enyimfa afamu kodu ɔdan no n'abankum afamu
column5: wɔ afɔrmbukyia no na dan no ho

column2: "Nna ɔdze ɔhen ne ba no fiir edzi
column3: na ɔdze ahenkyɛw no soaa no
column4: na ɔdze dase no maa no; na wɔhyɛɛ no hen
column5: na wɔseraa no; na wɔbobɔɔ hɔn nsamu see dɛ

column2: "Na aber a Atalia tsee aweɔmfo na ɔman no hɔn gyigyeegye no
column3: nna ɔbaa ɔman no nkyɛn wɔ EWURADZE fie:"

column2: "na ɔhwɛe
column5: ɔhen no gyina dum no ho
column7: na asafohen no na mbɛn no wɔ ɔhen no nkyɛn; na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara enyi gyee
column8: na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn. Nna Atalia tsetseew ne ntar mu

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Jehoiada hyɛɛ ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no a wɔhwɛ dɔm no do no
column4: Hom mfa no mfa akyerɛpɛn no ntamu; na hom mfa afona nku nyia obedzi n'ekyir no: na ɔsɔfo no see dɛ
column5: Mma mma wonnku no wɔ EWURADZE fie."

column2: "Nna wɔmaa no kwan; na ɔfaa ɔkwan a mpɔnkɔ nam do ba ɔhen no ne fie no do: na hɔ na wokum no."
"Na Jehoiada dze ahyɛmu too EWURADZE na ɔhen no na ɔman no ntamu
column3: dɛ wɔnyɛ EWURADZE ne man; na ɔdze too ɔhen no na ɔman no so ntamu."

column2: "Na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara sii mu kɔr Baal fie kobubuu no gui; n'afɔrmbukyia na n'ehonyi no
column4: na wokum Baal no sɔfoe Maatan wɔ afɔrmbukyia no enyim. Na ɔsɔfo no hyehyɛɛ EWURADZE ne fi do ahwɛdofo."

column2: "Na ɔfaa ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo
column3: na aweɔmfo na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara; na wɔdze ɔhen no fi EWURADZE fie sianee bɛfaa aweɔmfo kuropon ano ɔkwan no do baa ɔhen no ne fie. Na ɔtsenaa ahemfo ahengua no do."

column2: "Nna asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara enyi gyee
column3: na kurow no mu dwee: na wɔdze afona kum Atalia wɔ ɔhen no ne fie."

column2: "Aber a Joas hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe esuon."
